text:
A classic trig identity! Featuring Chebyshev polynomials.

\begin{array}{l}\n\frac{1}{\cos ^{2} 20^{\circ}}+\frac{1}{\cos ^{2} 40^{\circ}} \\\n+\frac{1}{\cos ^{2} 60^{\circ}}+\frac{1}{\cos ^{2} 80^{\circ}}\n\end{array}[imath]\frac{1}{\cos ^{2} 20^{\circ}}+\frac{1}{\cos ^{2} 40^{\circ}} [/imath] [imath]+\frac{1}{\cos ^{2} 60^{\circ}}+\frac{1}{\cos ^{2} 80^{\circ}}[/imath]
